title: France’s Mistral AI plans expansion into Canada
description: Rival to OpenAI and Canada’s Cohere to hire artificial intelligence scientists in Montreal
content:
French company Mistral AI is scouting for customers in Canada and plans to hire artificial intelligence scientists in Montreal, chief executive officer Arthur Mensch said on Monday.

title: Fact File: AI video sparks false rumour of CN Tower fire
description: This week, a video supposedly showing the CN Tower on fire went viral on Facebook. The video's creator is known for producing similar videos made with the help of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Micron forecasts first-quarter revenue above estimates on AI demand
description: Micron Technology forecast first-quarter revenue above market estimates on Tuesday, betting on booming demand for artificial intelligence hardware to boost sales of its advanced memory chips.
content:
Shares of the memory chip maker rose 4% in extended trading.

title: UCLA to co-lead a large-scale randomized trial of AI in breast cancer screening
description: UCLA and UC Davis will co-lead a newly funded, multi-institutional clinical trial to evaluate whether artificial intelligence (AI) can help support radiologists in interpreting mammograms more accurately, with the goal of improving breast cancer screening and reducing unnecessary callbacks and anxiety for patients.

title: Could artificial intelligence and a universal basic income eliminate 'meaningless jobs'?
description: COVID showed just how "fragile" our economic security is. As artificial intelligence potentially takes jobs from humans, a universal basic income might be a solution.
content:
Australia essentially did it during COVID. The world's richest man thinks it's inevitable. And a growing body of research suggests it could be the answer to AI shattering long-held high rates of employment.
A Universal Basic Income, or UBI, is a regu... [8445 chars]

title: MasterQuant Unveils AI-Powered Crypto Trading Mobile App Amid Market Surge
description: SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MasterQuant, a provider of AI-powered quantitative investment solutions, today announced the launch of its mobile application for iOS and Android devices. The app enables users to monitor investments, access real-time market insights, and activate automated strategies via its advanced crypto trading bots directly from their smartphones. This bold move aligns with the growing integration of artificial intelligence in cryptocurrency trading amid a sector experiencing heightened volatility and institutional adoption.

title: How microfluidics could solve AI's overheating crisis in power-hungry data centers
description: Microsoft turns to microfluidics to cool artificial intelligence chips as data centers expand.
